Universal Language Model Fine - tuning.name: ULMFiT
Universal Language Model Fine - tuning.from sentence: 1 ) We propose Universal Language Model Fine - tuning ( ULMFiT ) , a method that can be used to achieve CV - like transfer learning for any task for NLP .

to retain.from sentence: 2 ) We propose discriminative fine - tuning , slanted triangular learning rates , and gradual unfreezing , novel techniques to retain previous knowledge and avoid catastrophic forgetting during fine - tuning .
